channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL BigFix WebUI API

item.title: CVE-2023-28019|2023-07-18T17:57:23.111Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20webui%20api
item.description: Insufficient validation in Bigfix WebUI API App site version < 14 allows an authenticated WebUI user to issue SQL queries via an unparameterized SQL query.
